menu.aboutTitle: Tell your friends and family about SafeDeal
menu.freeToUseDesc: Using our service is free for you. When you make a purchase, the store pays us a small fee for guiding you to the best product.
menu.dataPrivacyDesc: We use publicly available data only, ensuring no brand or shop influences our recommendations.

tourKeys.Product: Recommended Products &Here you will see products recommended or not by red/green/yellow indicator
tourKeys.InsightsTab: Product Insights &Get detailed insights about the product's performance, popularity, and price trends. Look for color-coded indicators (red/yellow/green) to quickly assess product quality and reliability.
tourKeys.ReviewsTab: Customer Reviews &Read customer reviews and ratings to help you make an informed purchase decision.
tourKeys.ImagesTab: Product Images &View images of the product from various angles, including customer-uploaded photos.
tourKeys.VideosTab: Product Videos &Watch video reviews and demonstrations of the product.
tourKeys.FinishDescription: You now know the key features of Safe Deal. Start exploring and happy shopping!

shareWalkthough.step1Description: Share from Amazon, AliExpress, eBay app, or a browser.
shareWalkthough.step4Description: Select Safe Deal from the list.
